channel.title: The help
channel.description:
ok if you have a probelm with your server and you can no longer go on silab or any client do this
step1. go to start
step2. go to all programs
step3. go to acessories
step4. go to systems tools
step5. go to system restore think of a time where you didnt have the error fir instants i got an error 4 days ago so i went back to feburary 1st on the calender pressed restore button it turned off everything and presto it worked again :) :)

item.title: The help
item.dc:creator: @whosdr whosdr
item.description:
@whosdr wrote:

lol. i keep the zip one updated all the time so when i do mess up i just un-zip and replace. i also keep a backup one on another hard drive (external) yeh i got it good

Read full topic

item.title: The help
item.dc:creator: @runescape_junky runescape junky
item.description:
@runescape_junky wrote:

i totally agree i think this will help alot of people who like to screw around with there server

Read full topic

item.title: The help
item.dc:creator: @webhostbudd webhostbudd
item.description:
@webhostbudd wrote:

Actually, I wouldn’t recommend system restoring whenever you have a problem. That can be pretty problematic when a person finds out something they made or installed recently is missing.

I would really suggest that when people posted they would actually think and give details on the problem at hand rather than saying “o noes my server won’t work! help! help!”.

Read full topic
